Name: Salanova green sweet crisp
Description: Medium-dark green leaves with a very defined, three-dimensional shape

Name: Salanova Red Tango
Description: Lofty, tango type leaflets with an impressive dark red color

Name: Salanova Red Butter
Description: Triple red heads have a round base with open leaves

Name: Tatsoi
Description: Round, gently cupped green leaves with bright white, crunchy, juicy stems

Name: Baby GreenPac Choy
Description: Best baby pac choi because heads are proportional at true baby size.

Name: Sorrel
Description: Bright lemon flavor and produces some of the earliest greens of spring and the latest of fall.

Name: Kale Black Magic
Description: Black Magic is a well-maintained selection of Toscano kale with long and narrow leaves
